name: HandyGames Deluxe Pack
summary: A set of 3 unique games presented by Handy Games! Voice-operated puzzle action game "One Hand Clapping", side-scrolling action game "Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams - Ultimate Edition" in which you explore a world full of gimmicks, and cute cardboard puzzle "Pile Up! Box by Box". Can be enjoyed by children and adults alike. Let's go on a big adventure by operating pop characters on colorful stages!
